titleStmt.title: A briefe description of the whole world wherein is particularly described all the monarchies, empires, and kingdoms of the same, with their academies, as also their severall titles and scituations thereunto adjoyning / written by the Reverend Father in God George Abbot ...
titleStmt.author: Abbot, George, 1562-1633.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Margaret Sheares ... and John Playfere ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
